body_html:
LGTM, just one or two little questions.

We could also tweak app_test.py to use the unittest module, but I actually feel like it's a little nicer to see that it's getting actual command-line args routed through correctly.

body:
LGTM, just one or two little questions.

We could also tweak `app_test.py` to use the `unittest` module, but I actually feel like it's a little nicer to see that it's getting actual command-line args routed through correctly.
